entries.name: new(domain)
entries.desc: Creates a new InstallerSet that will look for gems in domain.

entries.name: add_always_install(dependency)
entries.desc: Looks up the latest specification for dependency and adds it to the always_install list.

entries.name: add_local(dep_name, spec, source)
entries.desc: Adds a local gem requested using dep_name with the given spec that can be loaded and installed using the source.

entries.name: find_all(req)
entries.desc: Returns an array of IndexSpecification objects matching DependencyRequest req.
